block.p: HIRSCH-Malverna. Beloved wife of the late Emanuel Hirsch, loving mother of Adrian and Zelda Hirsch and Lois & Richard Miller. Devoted grandmother of Andrew and Robin Hirsch, Elizabeth and Jonathan Stern, Roxanne and Michael Moskowitz, Evan and Nancy Miller and Jill and Richard Goldberg. Cherished great grandmother of Samantha, Austin, Justin, Brooke, Jordan, Alex, Brett, Nikki and Leif. One of the original founders of Boys Town of Jerusalem. Graveside services today 1PM at Mt. Hebron Cemetery, Flushing New York. Following the interment, the family will be at the residence of Mrs. Hirsch for one day. The remainder of the shiva period will be observed at the respective residences of the children.
